name: Just kill bats
description:
My first game. Ain't really a big game, or good, but it's a first! If you are even reading this, well, thanks, and I hope you liked the game. Or at don't feel like you wasted 5 minutes of your life.

Big thanks to HeartBeast, whose tutorial I followed and whose assets I used. I just made some additions and a couple of sprites.

*Tip: The first 3 grass patches have 2 life-ups and a stamina upgrade, which makes the game a bit easier, or playable...*
